title: Paella with chicken and chorizo
ingredients: ['1.25 litres chicken stock', '1 small pinch saffron (about 50mg)', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika (hot or mild)', '3 to 4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large Spanish onion, chopped', '2 large peppers, chopped', '2 to 3 cloves garlic, chopped', '500g chicken, chopped', '300g spicy cooking chorizo, chopped', '500g paella rice']
